class_notes: This class explores the influence of migration on German cultural life from 1989 to present. We will engage with literary and journalistic texts, films, and music videos created by individuals with personal experience and/or recent family histories of migration, with a particular focus on artists of color. This course fulfills the Race and Ethnicity General Education Requirement.
course_description: In-depth treatment of a topic in language, literature, or culture.
